metadata.title: TROOPERS24: Considerations on AI Security
metadata.description:
Talk by Florian Grunow and Hannes Mohr - June 27th, 2024 at TROOPERS24 IT security conference in Heidelberg, Germany hosted by @ERNW_ITSec

#TROOPERS24 #ITsecurity 
https://troopers.de/troopers24/talks/vnwhm8/

More impressions:
  / wearetroopers  
  / ernw_itsec  
https://infosec.exchange/@WEareTROOPERS
https://infosec.exchange/@ERNW https://ernw.de

metadata.title: TROOPERS24: Considerations on AI Security
metadata.description:
Talk by Florian Grunow and Hannes Mohr - June 27th, 2024 at TROOPERS24 IT security conference in Heidelberg, Germany hosted by @ERNW_ITSec

#TROOPERS24 #ITsecurity 
https://troopers.de/troopers24/talks/vnwhm8/

More impressions:

https://infosec.exchange/@WEareTROOPERS
https://infosec.exchange/@ERNW https://ernw.de
